titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of educational toys entered in December 11 through December 31, 2003.
A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of educational toys entered in December 11 through December 31, 2003.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Directs the Bureau of Customs and Border Protection to liquidate or reliquidate certain entries educational toys and refund any amounts owed.
